question: Please advice me whether there is any Sura I can recite in order to get a pious husband and a peaceful marriage life.
answer:
QUESTION
Sura for a Good Marriage My first marriage ended up in a misery as my husband left me and went away with another non muslim woman. I am a religious person. I would like to get married again, to a person who fear Allah and lead a good family life. Please advice me whether there is any Sura I can recite in order to get a pious husband and a peaceful marriage life.
ANSWER


Share:
Recite 500 times Durood Shareef everyday and make Du'aa thereafter. May
Allah Ta'ala grant you peace and happiness, Aameen.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
